name: 3 Piece - Embroidered Cambric Suit

reviews.comment: I can't get enough of this dress! The style is modern and chic, and it fits like a dream. The length is just right—not too short, not too long.
The dress has a beautiful design, and the color is gorgeous. The fabric is soft, but it’s a bit thinner than I expected, so it might need a slip underneath.

note: Actual product color may vary slightly from the image.
description: Embrace blooming florals in our turquoise, embroidered three-piece featuring a cambric shirt and trousers, with a matching bemberg crinkle chiffon dupatta.

name: 3 Piece - Embroidered Jacquard Suit

reviews.comment: I recently purchased this dress, and I couldn’t be happier with my choice. The fabric is high-quality, soft against the skin, and has just the right amount of stretch to make it comfortable to wear all day.

This dress is a wardrobe staple! The design is simple yet elegant, making it versatile for different occasions. Whether I'm dressing it up with heels or keeping it casual with flats, it always looks great.
Great dress! Fits perfectly and looks exactly like the pictures. The material is comfortable, and it’s versatile enough to dress up or down. Would highly recommend!

note: Actual product color may vary slightly from the image.
description: Create a regal look this season in our charcoal black, three-piece featuring a printed extra weft jacquard shirt, dyed cambric trousers, and embroidered manar dupatta.

details: Printed Embroidered Extra Weft Jacquard Shirt Front 1.15M
Printed Extra Weft Jacquard Shirt Sleeves & Back 2.54M

name: 3 Piece - Printed Cambric Suit

reviews.comment: This dress is fantastic! The fit is flattering, and the fabric is soft yet durable. It's perfect for both day and night events. I love the way it accentuates my figure without being too tight. Highly recommended!

I’m very happy with this purchase. The dress is well-made and looks just like the picture. The color is beautiful and vibrant, and it’s easy to style for various occasions. The only reason I’m not giving it a full 5 stars is that the hemline is slightly uneven, but it’s hardly noticeable.

A beautiful dress that fits like a dream! The material is soft and comfortable, with just the right amount of stretch. The design is timeless, making it a versatile addition to my closet. I’ve worn it to both casual outings and formal events, and it always looks great.

note: Actual product color may vary slightly from the image.

description: Elevate your seasonal style in our printed two-piece featuring a turquoise lawn shirt with a matching voile dupatta.

name: Embroidered Egyptian Cotton Suit

reviews.comment: This shirt is excellent! The fabric is soft and breathable, perfect for both casual and formal occasions. The fit is spot on, not too tight and not too loose. I’ve washed it a few times, and it still looks as good as new. Definitely worth the money.

These trousers are a great addition to my wardrobe. The material is high-quality and feels durable. They fit comfortably around the waist and have a nice tapered look. I appreciate the attention to detail, like the stitching and the pockets.

I bought this jacket for the winter, and it’s been a solid choice. It’s warm and stylish, with a modern cut that doesn’t feel bulky. The only thing I’d improve is the zipper, which sometimes gets stuck, but overall, it’s a great buy.

note: Actual product color may vary slightly from the image.
shirt: Make a dapper statement in our lightweight, and breathable embroidered brown two-piece suit. With the finest quality Egyptian cotton and premium ammonia finish, elevate your traditional look with unparalleled sophistication.
details: Embroidered Front, Plain Back, Full Sleeves with Cuff, Band Neckline
